message.name: PAGE_DESC_SUMMARY
message.locale: Complete Merge

message.name: MERGE_ALREADY_COMPLETE
message.locale: The merge is already complete. The merge option cannot be selected again.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_INTEGRATED_CASE_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the primary client for a newly created Integrated Case.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the primary client for a newly created Product Delivery.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_ISSUE_DELIVERY_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the primary client for a newly created Issue Delivery.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_SERVICE_PLAN_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the primary client for a newly created Service Plan.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_SCREENING_CASE_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the primary client for a newly created Screening Case.

message.name: ERR_DUPLICATE_MERGE_IN_PROGRESS
message.locale: A duplicate cannot be merged to a master where the merge process has been initiated but not completed for another duplicate.

message.name: ERR_DUPLICATE_MERGE_COMPLETE
message.locale: A merge has already been completed for this duplicate.

message.name: INF_MARKED_AS_DUPLICATE
message.locale: %1s has been marked as a duplicate of %2s.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PERSON_CANNOT_BE_DUPLICATE_OF_PROSPECT_PERSON
message.locale: A person cannot be marked as a duplicate of a prospect person.

message.name: ERR_XFV_MASTER_PERSON_CANNOT_BE_DUPLICATE
message.locale: %1s is already the primary client for duplicate(s): %2s. They cannot be marked as duplicate of another primary client.

message.name: ERR_XFV_DUPLICATE_MUST_BE_LOWER_SENSITIVITY_THAN_MASTER
message.locale: The duplicate person or prospect person must be of the same sensitivity or lower than the person they are marked as a duplicate of.

message.name: ERR_XFV_MASTER_PERSON_CANNOT_BE_DUPLICATE_OF_THEMSELF
message.locale: A client can not be marked as a duplicate of the same client.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTERNATEID_EXISTS_FOR_ORIGINAL
message.locale: Alternate ID "%1s" already exists for %2s.

message.name: INF_UNMARK_DUPLICATE_MAINTAIN_MERGED_DATA
message.locale: %1s has been unmarked as a duplicate. Please ensure that any merged data is removed.

message.name: ERR_CLIENT_NOT_DUPLICATE
message.locale: A client must be marked as a duplicate before a merge can take place.

message.name: INF_SELECTED_DATA_WILL_BE_MERGED
message.locale: Any data you have selected to merge will be merged when you select 'Next'.

message.name: INF_ALTERNATE_ID_EXISTS_TWICE
message.locale: Alternate ID "%1s" exists on both the Master and Duplicate Clients. Please update so this record only appears once.

message.name: INF_BANK_ACCOUNT_EXISTS_TWICE
message.locale: Bank Account Number "%1s" and branch "%2s" exist on both the Master and Duplicate Clients. Please update so this record only appears once.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PERSON_TO_MARK_CANNOT_BE_DUPLICATE
message.locale: The selected duplicate record is already marked as a duplicate for %1s.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_INVESTIGATION_DELIVERY_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the primary client for a newly created Investigation Delivery.
